headline: Equifax (EFX): Evaluating Undervaluation After Modest Share Price Recovery
summary: Equifax (EFX) shares are starting the week with modest gains, drifting up 3% over the past seven days. Investors may be taking a closer look after a 7% slide during the past month. See our latest analysis for Equifax. After a sharp decline over the past 90 days, Equifax’s recent 3% recovery hints that some investors see a turnaround brewing. Still, momentum remains lackluster. The 1-year total shareholder return is negative 15%, which falls far short of the broader market and signals the...
